verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, cause <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations<s%>;

and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: Thy <S%H4351>birth<s%> and thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%> is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>; the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> was thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>.

And as for thy <S%H4138>nativity<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> thou wast <S%H3205>born<s%> thy <S%H8270>navel<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut<s%>, neither wast thou <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>cleanse<s%> <S%H4414>thee<s%>; thou wast not salted at <S%H4414>all<s%>, nor <S%H2853>swaddled<s%> at <S%H2853>all<s%>.

No <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>, to do <S%H259>any<s%> of these things unto <S%H2550>thee<s%>, to have compassion upon <S%H7993>thee<s%>; but thou wast cast out in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>, for that thy <S%H5315>person<s%> was <S%H1604>abhorred<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou wast <S%H3205>born<s%>.

And when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>thee<s%>, and saw thee <S%H947>weltering<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>, I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1818>thee<s%>, Though thou art in thy blood, <S%H2421>live<s%>; <S%H559>yea<s%>, I said unto <S%H1818>thee<s%>, Though thou art in thy blood, <S%H2421>live<s%>.

I <S%H5414>caused<s%> thee to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as that which <S%H6780>groweth<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and thou didst <S%H7235>increase<s%> and wax <S%H1431>great<s%>, and thou <S%H935>attainedst<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornament<s%>; thy <S%H7699>breasts<s%> were <S%H3559>fashioned<s%>, and thy <S%H8181>hair<s%> was <S%H6779>grown<s%>; yet thou wast <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>.

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>thee<s%>, and looked upon <S%H6256>thee<s%>, behold, thy time was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%>; and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over <S%H3680>thee<s%>, and covered thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: <S%H7650>yea<s%>, I sware unto <S%H935>thee<s%>, and entered into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, and thou becamest mine.
Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I thee with <S%H4325>water<s%>; <S%H7857>yea<s%>, I thoroughly washed away thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H5480>thee<s%>, and I anointed thee with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> thee also with broidered <S%H7553>work<s%>, and <S%H5274>shod<s%> thee with <S%H8476>sealskin<s%>, and I <S%H2280>girded<s%> thee about with fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> thee with <S%H4897>silk<s%>.
And I <S%H5710>decked<s%> thee with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>, and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> upon thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> on thy <S%H1627>neck<s%>.
And I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>ring<s%> upon thy <S%H639>nose<s%>, and <S%H5694>ear-rings<s%> in thine <S%H241>ears<s%>, and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> upon thy <S%H7218>head<s%>.

Thus wast thou <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and thy <S%H4403>raiment<s%> was of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H4897>silk<s%>, and broidered <S%H7553>work<s%>; thou didst <S%H398>eat<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>; and thou wast <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%>, and thou didst <S%H6743>prosper<s%> unto royal <S%H4410>estate<s%>.

And thy <S%H8034>renown<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> for thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>; for it was <S%H3632>perfect<s%>, through my <S%H1926>majesty<s%> which I had <S%H7760>put<s%> upon <S%H5002>thee<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

But thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> because of thy <S%H8034>renown<s%>, and pouredst <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> on every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>; his it was.

And thou didst <S%H3947>take<s%> of thy <S%H899>garments<s%>, and madest for thee high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H6213>decked<s%> with divers <S%H2921>colors<s%>, and playedst the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> upon <S%H935>them<s%>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

Thou didst also <S%H3947>take<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of my <S%H3701>silver<s%>, which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6213>thee<s%>, and madest for thee <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men<s%>, and didst play the harlot with <S%H2181>them<s%>;

and thou <S%H3947>tookest<s%> thy <S%H7553>broidered<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3680>coveredst<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, and didst set mine <S%H8081>oil<s%> and mine <S%H7004>incense<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

My <S%H3899>bread<s%> also which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5560>thee<s%>, fine flour, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, wherewith I <S%H398>fed<s%> <S%H5414>thee<s%>, thou didst even set it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%>; and thus it <S%H5002>was<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

Moreover thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, whom thou hast <S%H3205>borne<s%> unto <S%H2076>me<s%>, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be <S%H398>devoured<s%>. Were thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> a small <S%H4592>matter<s%>,
that thou hast <S%H7819>slain<s%> my <S%H1121>children<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them <S%H5674>up<s%>, in causing them to pass through the fire unto them?

And in all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> thou hast not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, when thou wast <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>, and wast <S%H947>weltering<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
And it is come to pass <S%H310>after<s%> all thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, <S%H188>(woe<s%>, <S%H188>woe<s%> unto <S%H5002>thee<s%>! saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>,)
that thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%> unto thee a vaulted <S%H1354>place<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> thee a lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%> thy lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way<s%>, and hast made thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%> an <S%H8581>abomination<s%>, and hast <S%H6589>opened<s%> thy <S%H7272>feet<s%> to every one that passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredom<s%>.

Thou hast also committed <S%H2181>fornication<s%> with the <S%H1121>Egyptians<s%>, thy <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; and hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredom<s%>, to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

Behold <S%H5186>therefore<s%>, I have stretched out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over <S%H1639>thee<s%>, and have diminished thine <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> <S%H5414>food<s%>, and delivered thee unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1323>thee<s%>, the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, that are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of thy <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Thou hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> also with the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%>, <S%H1115>because<s%> thou wast <S%H7646>insatiable<s%>; <S%H2181>yea<s%>, thou hast played the harlot with <S%H7654>them<s%>, and yet thou wast not satisfied.

Thou hast moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thy <S%H8457>whoredom<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>traffic<s%>, unto <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%>; and yet thou wast not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H2063>herewith<s%>.

How <S%H535>weak<s%> is thy <S%H3826>heart<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, seeing thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> all these <S%H4639>things<s%>, the work of an impudent7986, Ruth2 <S%H2181>harlot<s%>;

in that thou <S%H1129>buildest<s%> thy vaulted <S%H1354>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H6213>makest<s%> thy lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street<s%>, and hast not been as a <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, in that thou <S%H7046>scornest<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%>.
A <S%H802>wife<s%> that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%>! that <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> instead of her <S%H376>husband<s%>!

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to all <S%H2181>harlots<s%>; but thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> thy <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>, and <S%H7809>bribest<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, that they may come unto thee on every <S%H5439>side<s%> for thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>.

And thou art <S%H2016>different<s%> from other <S%H802>women<s%> in thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%>, in that none <S%H310>followeth<s%> thee to play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>; and whereas thou <S%H5414>givest<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%>, and no <S%H868>hire<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H1961>thee<s%>, therefore thou art <S%H2016>different<s%>.
Wherefore <S%H2181><s%>, O harlot, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, Because thy <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out<s%>, and thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> through thy <S%H8457>whoredoms<s%> with thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>; and because of all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of thy <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, and for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, that thou didst give unto <S%H5414>them<s%>;

therefore <S%H6908>behold<s%>, I will gather all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%>, with whom thou hast taken <S%H6149>pleasure<s%>, and all them that thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%>, with all them that thou hast <S%H8130>hated<s%>; I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them against thee on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, that they may see all thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

And I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5003>thee<s%>, as women that break wedlock and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> upon thee the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.

I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> thee into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and they shall throw <S%H2040>down<s%> thy vaulted <S%H1354>place<s%>, and break <S%H5422>down<s%> thy lofty <S%H7413>places<s%>; and they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> thee of thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> thy <S%H8597>fair<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%>; and they shall <S%H3240>leave<s%> thee <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%>.

They shall also bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> against <S%H7275>thee<s%>, and they shall stone thee with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and thrust thee <S%H1333>through<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> thy <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>; and I will cause thee to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and thou shalt also <S%H5414>give<s%> no hire any <S%H868>more<s%>.

So will I cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> toward thee to <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H8252>thee<s%>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more <S%H3707>angry<s%>.

Because thou hast not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, but hast <S%H7264>raged<s%> against me in all these <S%H1887>things<s%>; therefore, behold, I also will <S%H5414>bring<s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> upon thy <S%H7218>head<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: and thou shalt not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> with all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.
Behold <S%H4911><s%>, every one that useth proverbs shall use this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> against <S%H559>thee<s%>, saying, As is the <S%H517>mother<s%>, so is her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

Thou art the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, that <S%H1602>loatheth<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>children<s%>; and thou art the <S%H269>sister<s%> of thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>, who <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H582>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>children<s%>: your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and your <S%H1>father<s%> an <S%H567>Amorite<s%>.

And thine <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> at thy left <S%H8040>hand<s%>, she and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and thy <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> at thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Yet hast thou not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in their <S%H1870>ways<s%>, nor <S%H6213>done<s%> after their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>; <S%H6985>but<s%>, as if that were a very <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7843>thing<s%>, thou wast more corrupt than <S%H2004>they<s%> in all thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> thy <S%H269>sister<s%> hath not <S%H6213>done<s%>, she nor her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, as thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, thou and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

Behold <S%H5771><s%>, this was the iniquity of thy <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>: <S%H1347>pride<s%>, <S%H7653>fulness<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H7962>prosperous<s%> <S%H8252>ease<s%> was in her and in her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; neither did she <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>.
And they were <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, and <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5493>me<s%>: therefore I took them away as I saw <S%H7200>good<s%>.

Neither hath <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H2398>committed<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of thy <S%H2403>sins<s%>; but thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> more than <S%H2007>they<s%>, and hast <S%H6663>justified<s%> thy <S%H269>sisters<s%> by all thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>.

Thou <S%H5375>also<s%>, bear thou thine own <S%H3639>shame<s%>, in that thou hast given <S%H6419>judgment<s%> for thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>; through thy <S%H2403>sins<s%> that thou hast committed more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> than <S%H2004>they<s%>, they are more <S%H6663>righteous<s%> that <S%H954>thou<s%>: yea, be thou also confounded, and <S%H5375>bear<s%> thy <S%H3639>shame<s%>, in that thou hast <S%H6663>justified<s%> thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>.

And I will turn <S%H7725>again<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of thy <S%H7622>captives<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>them<s%>;
that thou mayest <S%H5375>bear<s%> thine own <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and mayest be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> because of all that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, in that thou art a comfort unto <S%H5162>them<s%>.

And thy <S%H269>sisters<s%>, <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>; and <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate<s%>; and thou and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to your former <S%H6927>estate<s%>.
For thy <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> was not <S%H8052>mentioned<s%> by thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H1347>pride<s%>,

before thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> was <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, as at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and of all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1323>her<s%>, the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, that do <S%H7590>despite<s%> unto thee round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5375>borne<s%> thy <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and thine <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3045>thee<s%>; and thou shalt know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

that thou mayest <S%H2142>remember<s%>, and be <S%H954>confounded<s%>, and never <S%H6610>open<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> any <S%H6440>more<s%>, because of thy <S%H3639>shame<s%>, when I have <S%H3722>forgiven<s%> thee all that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
